name: ASF Summer Tour MMXIII: Connecticut Show  - TICKET + MERCH BUNDLE
description:
The AliveSinceForever Collective has had shows at SXSW, Texas, Florida, NY, and St. Louis;

Now, for the first time ever, ASF will be performing in Connecticut. Alongside Trippz Michaud and other local talent, ASF will have the whole squad here to perform at our very first headlining concert. 

This show will be featuring the entire ASF crew including Connecticut's own Dom McLennon & Mic Kurb, as well as local talent including East Hartford's KushedCody, Manchester artist Dough, Kid Dop3 from the Greater Hartford area and South Windsor's Trippz Michaud at All Stars Sports Bar & Grill in Manchester CT. June 29th. 

Once you order your ticket in roughly 24 hours you will receive an email (same email address you used to order the ticket, check all your email folders) with your own custom numbered ticket for the show. You can bring this to the door with your smartphone or print it out as well.

**IN ADDITION TO THE TICKET THIS BUNDLE INCLUDES**
NEW ASF SUMMER MMXIII TANK ($5 OFF) 
FULL SET OF ASF STICKERS 
+ MORE ITEMS TO BE ANNOUNCED

(Be sure to select the correct tank top size)

Doors open at 7 PM!

name: ASF 3-D Logo Tee
description:
First official piece of ASF merchandise, designed by ASF's own HK (http://twitter.com/HKCovers)
Only 100 available, $5 shipping added.
If you are in the following locations hit your closest ASF member up to get your shirt for $20!

Connecticut - @ROMEASF, @NickGillz, @MiCKurb, @DomMcLennon, @WhiteBoyJon

New York - @AkoASF

Texas - @AmeerVann, @TheASFCrew

Florida - @robertontenient, ASFranc0, @FrankZed_

Follow @TheASFCrew for more updates!
